title: Trump calls Indiana lawmakers amid growing redistricting pressure
shortDescription: Meanwhile, Gov. Mike Braun says a decision hasn't been made yet about whether to call a special legislative session to draw new maps.

title: Trump halts more projects in Democrat-led cities, citing shutdown
shortDescription: The Trump administration had already paused billions of dollars in Democrat-led cities and states since the shutdown began on Oct.1

title: Trump asks Supreme Court to allow National Guard deployment in Chicago
shortDescription: Trump asked the Supreme Court to allow him to deploy National Guard troops in Chicago while a lawsuit challenging the mission is litigated.

title: Trump resists Ukraine missile request
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy he wants to avoid sending Tomahawk missiles, citing U.S. supply concerns.

title: When is the Senate's next government shutdown vote? What to know
shortDescription: The ongoing government shutdown is quickly approaching historic milestones. Here's what to know about the next vote in the Senate.

title: Trump says Venezuela's Maduro 'doesn't want to f--- around' with US
shortDescription: President Trump used choice words to explain why Venezuela Nicolás Maduro has offered the United States stake in Venezuela's natural resources.

title: Trump proposes Endangered Species Act change
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's administration has proposed a significant change to the Endangered Species Act by redefining the word “harm” within the law.

title: Trump calls proposal for a tunnel from Russia to Alaska 'interesting'
shortDescription: Trump called a proposed tunnel from Russia to Alaska 'interesting' and said he would 'have to think about that.'

title: Who Trump's Justice Department is after
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's Justice Department has recently indicted three people Trump said he wanted to see prosecuted. Here's what we know.

title: Congressman blames swastika flag in his office on a 'ruse'
shortDescription: Ohio Republican Congressman Dave Taylor said that a photo in his Capitol Hill office showing a US flag altered with a swastika was part of a Republican-targeted “ruse.”

title: Hacker plays anti-Trump message at airport
shortDescription: A message stating profanities against President Trump and Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu was played over the airport PA after a hacking incident.

title: Trump: Putin opposes Tomahawk sale to Ukraine
shortDescription: President Trump responds sarcastically when asked by USA Today White House correspondent about Tomahawks for Ukraine.

title: Kremlin envoy proposes a 'Putin-Trump tunnel' to link Russia and US
shortDescription: Kremlin envoy Kirill Dmitriev floated the tunnel idea late on Thursday after Putin spoke to Trump by phone and agreed to meet in Budapest.

title: Missing Long Island politician's name will still be on Nov. 4 ballot
shortDescription: New York political candidate Petros Krommidas' name will still be on the Nov. 4 ballot, despite him being missing since April.

title: Trump says he has 'right to cut' welfare programs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump talked about the government shutdown and the No Kings protest with Maria Bartiromo on Fox Business News.

title: Trump won't commit to Tomahawk missiles in meeting with Zelenskyy
shortDescription: Trump told Zelenskyy there's "a chance to end the war quickly" and expressed concerns about sending Ukraine long-range Tomahawk missiles.

title: Law to stop illegal labor often ignored by Arizona employers
shortDescription: A law intended to cut off the demand for illegal labor has netted only few violations. It's often ignored a generation after it began.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump seeks an end to 'inglorious' Russia-Ukraine war
shortDescription: Trump meets with Zelenskyy after Putin call and more news to start your Friday.
